sentence: Mr. Kinzinger, who isn't running for re-election, said his fellow Republicans have allowed conspiracies and toxic tribalism [to] hinder their ability to see clear-eyed.? The censure and a related procedural move would clear the way for the RNC to financially support Ms. Cheney's primary opponent, Harriet Hageman.
author: Siobhan Hughes
title: Cheney, Kinzinger Censured by RNC as Trump Rift Widens
